The '''Aerial Express''' is a train found in [[Constellation Metropole]], [[Simulanka]].

==Overview==
The Aerial Express is a flying train that can be found on the highest point of the city Constellation Metropole. It is used in the {{Quest|They Once Walked the Starry Sky}} in order to put the [[Scattered Star|stars]] back onto the sky, and the player is free to ride the train again after completing the quest.

==Trivia==
* At the end of the Event Quest ''They Once Walked the Starry Skies'', Navia can be seen talking to [[Nilou]] offering Nilou to ride the Aerial Express.
* According to Navia, the Aerial Express hasn't been used in a hundred years.
